profiles.name: Enrique Montes
profiles.summary: Strapi developer expert in API development, custom plugins, migrations from WordPress/Contentful. Integrate Strapi with Next.js and automate workflows with n8n. Full-stack developer with 7 years experience building fast, scalable web applications. Focus on performance (SSR, SSG, ISR), SEO, clean architecture, CI/CD, Docker, AWS/Vercel. Results: 60% faster load times, 50% less content management time, 70% fewer manual tasks. Services: Full-stack development (Strapi + Next.js), CMS migrations, performance optimization, workflow automation, API development, DevOps. Tech stack: Strapi, Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, n8n, Docker, AWS, Vercel, Netlify.

portfolio.title: Peters - App Optimization
portfolio.description: Fixed Gravity Forms WordPress integration, improved app performance with Gatsby.js and Netlify hosting.

portfolio.title: Bridge Artists - Website Maintenance
portfolio.description: Fixed Gatsby/Contentful errors on Netlify, performed site development, maintenance, and data modeling.

portfolio.title: Luxury Fountain Pen - Next.js
portfolio.description: Built modern website with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. Implemented interactive animations and responsive UI components.

portfolio.title: Texas Ranches - Gatsby Development
portfolio.description: Developed dynamic website with Gatsby, Sanity CRM, and Algolia search. Enhanced user engagement and content updates.

portfolio.title: MoneyGeek - Full-Stack Development
portfolio.description: Updated website with Gatsby frontend and Strapi CMS. Improved UI/UX, added features and third-party integrations.

portfolio.title: Osmocote - Gatsby Update from V2 to V5
portfolio.description: Upgraded outdated Gatsby version, enhanced performance and compatibility. Improved functionality and user experience.

portfolio.title: Multilingual Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: Personal portfolio with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Strapi. Available in 5 languages with precise translations.

portfolio.title: Frida Travel - Vacation Platform
portfolio.description: Dynamic travel website with Gatsby.js and Contentful for Mexican destinations. Fast, interactive, and visually appealing.

portfolio.title: Turista Mexico - Travel Guide
portfolio.description: Comprehensive travel guide to Mexico destinations using PHP and MySQL. Robust database-driven web application.

portfolio.title: Turista Estado de México
portfolio.description: Tourism website for State of Mexico with Gatsby, Tailwind CSS, and GraphQL. Detailed destination information.

portfolio.title: Turista Chiapas - Tourism Portal
portfolio.description: Tourism website for Chiapas region featuring natural wonders, hotels, events, and cultural highlights.

portfolio.title: THoteles.com - Accommodation Platform
portfolio.description: Spanish platform for unique accommodations built with WordPress, PHP, MySQL on Digital Ocean.

portfolio.title: Gano Excel Cancun - Health Platform
portfolio.description: Bilingual health wellness website for premium coffee products using Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS.
